channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- VIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- VIOS

item.title: CVE-2021-29741|2024-09-16T20:46:34.253Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a local user to exploit a vulnerability in Korn Shell (ksh) to gain root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 201478.

item.title: CVE-2021-29862|2024-09-16T18:03:15.846Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX kernel to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 206086.

item.title: CVE-2020-4788|2024-09-16T19:05:08.453Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM Power9 (AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1) processors could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information from the data in the L1 cache under extenuating circumstances. IBM X-Force ID: 189296.

item.title: CVE-2020-4829|2024-09-16T18:04:01.484Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a local user to exploit a vulnerability in the ksu user command to gain root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 189960.
